title: Zeroes or X Intercept
text: Think about what $$x$$ values would cause the function to be equal to zero. How could you solve for the $$x$$ values that lead to a $$y$$ value of 0?

title: Domain
text: When determining domain, solve for any undefined values, such as when the denominator is equal to zero.

title: Range
text: Think about the maximum and minimum of f(x) as $$x$$ approaches $$4$$ and $$-4$$.
